desc: Period Promise, formerly Tampon Tuesday®, is a United Way campaign aiming to reduce vulnerability and isolation caused by period poverty. Together, we can help people live with the dignity we all deserve, creating healthier, more caring and inclusive communities.

layout.text:
Periods are a fact of life.

Every year thousands of people have to choose between safe menstrual products or other basic necessities.
Pledge for change. Pledge for empowerment. Pledge for equity.
Join us in easing period poverty through this year’s Period Promise campaign.
